headline: Meta Platforms Stock Looks Cheap - Short OTM Puts for a 2% One-Month Yield
summary: Meta Platforms' stock is near its recent peak of $738, as of June 30, but strong free cash flow projections could push it higher. Nevertheless, in the near term, it might falter after the upcoming Q2 results. Shorting OTM puts works here.

headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks with Competitive Advantages
summary: Stocks that outperform the market usually share key traits such as rising sales, expanding margins, and increasing returns on capital. The select few that can do all three for many years are often the ones that make you life-changing money.

headline: Scale AI's Alexandr Wang Went From MIT Dropout To AI Billionaire — 5 Things You Might Not Know
summary: Alexandr Wang may not be a name familiar to all investors yet, but he is one of the most recognizable names in the artificial intelligence space, thanks to his co-founding of Scale AI and his previous role as CEO. As Wang steps down from the company and shifts to Meta Platforms (NASDAQ:META), he may become more recognizable to new investors. Here's a look at five things you may not know about Wang.
